Container.Name: pairdrop
Container.Overview: PairDrop(https://github.com/schlagmichdoch/PairDrop) is a sublime alternative to AirDrop that works on all platforms. Send images, documents or text via peer to peer connection to devices in the same local network/Wi-Fi or to paired devices.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-03-06 - Run npm install as non-root user.
### 2023-02-20 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: RATE_LIMIT
Config.Description: Set to `true` to limit clients to 100 requests per 5 min

Config.Name: WS_FALLBACK
Config.Description: Set to `true` to enable websocket fallback if the peer to peer WebRTC connection is not available to the client (see App Setup notes).

Config.Name: RTC_CONFIG
Config.Description: Path to a json file containing custom STUN/TURN config (see App Setup notes)

Config.Name: DEBUG_MODE
Config.Description: Set to `true` to debug the http server configuration by logging clients IP addresses used by PairDrop to STDOUT. See here for more info(https://github.com/schlagmichdoch/PairDrop/blob/master/docs/host-your-own.md#debug-mode). Do not use in production!
